an5.214:1.3: Musa bhanati, pisunam bhanati, pharusam bhanati, samphappalapam bhanati, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an5.214:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava bahubhanismim puggale.
an5.214:2.3: Na musa bhanati, na pisunam bhanati, na pharusam bhanati, na samphappalapam bhanati, kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
an5.214:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca anisamsa mantabhanismim puggale”ti.
